<!-- @generated by usage-cli from usage spec -->
# `mise config generate`

- **Usage**: `mise config generate [FLAGS]`
- **Aliases**: `g`
- **Source code**: [`src/cli/config/generate.rs`](https://github.com/jdx/mise/blob/main/src/cli/config/generate.rs)

Generate a mise.toml file

## Flags

### `-o --output <OUTPUT>`

Output to file instead of stdout

### `-t --tool-versions <TOOL_VERSIONS>`

Path to a .tool-versions file to import tools from

### `-n --dry-run`

Show what would be generated without writing to file

Examples:

```
mise config generate         # creates mise.toml
mise config generate -o .mise.toml
mise config generate -y      # skip interactive wizard
mise config generate -n      # preview without writing
```
